description:
Leveraging technologies born from their alpine experience, then designed with a focused minimalism, the Sawyer delivers Gore-Tex performance with a look refined for the city. Waterproof, windproof and breathable, it protects from summer showers and winter storms. The Gore-Tex material is comfortable, quiet, and has a bluesign® approved tricot liner and PFC-free DWR treatment. Articulated sleeves add freedom of movement, the ¾ length extends coverage and an adjustable hood sheds rain and snow.

Updated with a PFC-free DWR and revised Gore-Tex fabric with a tricot backer made from dope dyed recycled yarns.
name: Arcteryx Sawyer Coat - Mens
